abilities.name: Intimidating Ring
abilities.effect: As long as Ursaring is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Basic Pokémon can't attack or use any Poké-Powers.

attacks.name: Drag Off
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with the Defending Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 20 damage to the new Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch.

attacks.name: Rock Smash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.
